description.english: Obtain all trophies.
description.german: Erhalten Sie alle Trophäen.
description.french: Obtenir tous les trophées.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti i trofei.
description.spanish: Obtén todos los trofeos.
description.schinese: 获得所有奖杯
description.tchinese: 獲得所有獎盃
description.russian: Получите все призы.
description.japanese: 全てのトロフィーを取得する
description.portuguese: Obtenha todos os troféus.
description.polish: Zdobądź wszystkie trofea.
description.brazilian: Obtenha todos os troféus.

description.english: Win once in all game modes.
description.german: Siegen Sie in allen Spielmodi einmal.
description.french: Remporter une victoire dans chaque mode de jeu.
description.italian: Ottieni 1 vittoria in ogni modalità di gioco.
description.spanish: Consigue 1 victoria en todos los modos.
description.schinese: 在所有游戏模式中各获得1次胜利
description.tchinese: 在所有遊戲模式中各獲得1次勝利
description.russian: Выиграйте по одному разу во всех игровых режимах.
description.japanese: 全ゲームモードでそれぞれ１回勝利する
description.portuguese: Vença uma vez em todos os modos de jogo.
description.polish: Wygraj raz w każdym trybie gry.
description.brazilian: Vença uma vez em todos os modos de jogo.

displayName.japanese: さらなる勝利への欲求

description.english: Win five times in all game modes.
description.german: Siegen Sie in allen Spielmodi 5-mal.
description.french: Remporter 5 victoires dans chaque mode de jeu.
description.italian: Ottieni 5 vittorie in ogni modalità di gioco.
description.spanish: Consigue 5 victorias en todos los modos.
description.schinese: 在所有游戏模式中各获得5次胜利
description.tchinese: 在所有遊戲模式中各獲得5次勝利
description.russian: Выиграйте по пять раз во всех игровых режимах.
description.japanese: 全ゲームモードでそれぞれ５回勝利する
description.portuguese: Vença cinco vezes em todos os modos de jogo.
description.polish: Wygraj pięć razy w każdym trybie gry.
description.brazilian: Vença cinco vezes em todos os modos de jogo.

description.english: Get 50 total wins.
description.german: Siegen Sie insgesamt 50-mal.
description.french: Remporter 50 victoires.
description.italian: Ottieni 50 vittorie in totale.
description.spanish: Consigue 50 victorias.
description.schinese: 达成累积50次胜利
description.tchinese: 達成累計50次勝利
description.russian: Одержите в общей сложности 50 побед.
description.japanese: 通算５０勝を達成
description.portuguese: Atinja 50 vitórias.
description.polish: Zdobądź łącznie 50 zwycięstw.
description.brazilian: Atinja 50 vitórias.

description.english: Win a game set without losing a round in any game mode.
description.german: Siegen Sie in einem beliebigen Spielmodus, ohne auch nur eine Runde zu verlieren.
description.french: Remporter un match sans perdre de round dans n'importe quel mode.
description.italian: Vinci una partita senza perdere un solo round in qualsiasi modalità.
description.spanish: Gana un set sin perder ni un round en cualquier modo.
description.schinese: 在任意规则中以未输掉任何回合的状况获得胜利
description.tchinese: 在任意規則中以未輸掉任何回合的狀況獲得勝利
description.russian: Выиграйте серию игр, не проиграв ни одного раунда, в любом игровом режиме.
description.japanese: いずれかのルールで１ラウンドも負けずに勝利する
description.portuguese: Vença uma partida sem perder nenhuma rodada em qualquer modo de jogo.
description.polish: Wygraj grę bez przegranej rundy w dowolnym trybie.
description.brazilian: Vença uma partida sem perder nenhuma rodada em qualquer modo de jogo.

displayName.schinese: 祝贺！首度拿下最佳玩家

description.english: Be chosen as the MVP in any game mode.
description.german: Werden Sie in einem beliebigen Spielmodus der beste Spieler.
description.french: Être élu meilleur joueur dans n'importe quel mode.
description.italian: Diventa l'MVP di una partita.
description.spanish: Conviértete en el JMV (jugador más valorado) en cualquier modo.
description.schinese: 获选为任意一种模式的最佳玩家
description.tchinese: 獲選為任意一種模式的MVP
description.russian: Станьте СЦИ в любом игровом режиме.
description.japanese: いずれかのMVPに選出される
description.portuguese: Seja escolhido MVP em qualquer modo de jogo.
description.polish: Otrzymaj tytuł MVP w dowolnym trybie gry.
description.brazilian: Seja escolhido MVP em qualquer modo de jogo.

displayName.russian: Для бешеной собаки и сто километров - не круг

description.english: Run 100 m while holding the heated brainer.
description.german: Laufen Sie mit einem erhitzten Beil 100 m.
description.french: Courir 100 m en maintenant le Brainer incandescent.
description.italian: Corri 100 metri tenendo il brainer caricato.
description.spanish: Corre 100 metros con el Brainer caliente.
description.schinese: 在发动高热镐的状态下冲刺100米
description.tchinese: 在發動高熱鎬的狀態下衝刺100公尺
description.russian: Пробегите 100 м с нагретой кувалдой.
description.japanese: ヒートバイル状態で１００ｍ疾走する
description.portuguese: Corra 100 m com o racha-crânio aquecido.
description.polish: Przebiegnij 100 m z rozgrzanym mózgowcem.
description.brazilian: Corra 100 m com o racha-crânio aquecido.

description.english: Achieve a counter.
description.german: Landen Sie einen Konter.
description.french: Réussir un contre.
description.italian: Esegui un contrattacco.
description.spanish: Realiza un counter.
description.schinese: 成功使出反击
description.tchinese: 成功使出反擊
description.russian: Проведите контратаку.
description.japanese: カウンター成功
description.portuguese: Realize um contra-ataque.
description.polish: Wykonaj kontrę.
description.brazilian: Realize um contra-ataque.

description.english: Kill an enemy player while using the zombie shield.
description.german: Töten Sie einen gegnerischen Spieler, während Sie einen Zombie-Schild halten.
description.french: Tuer un joueur ennemi tout en utilisant un zombie comme bouclier.
description.italian: Elimina un giocatore usando uno scudo zombie.
description.koreana: 좀비 실드 중 적 플레이어를 킬
description.spanish: Elimina a un jugador enemigo usando un escudo zombi.
description.schinese: 在丧尸肉盾状态下击杀敌方玩家
description.tchinese: 在喪屍肉盾狀態下擊殺敵方玩家
description.russian: Убейте игрока, используя зомби-щит.
description.japanese: ゾンビシールド中に敵プレーヤーをキル
description.portuguese: Usando um escudo zumbi, mate um jogador inimigo.
description.polish: Zabij wrogiego gracza, trzymając zombi–tarczę.
description.brazilian: Usando um escudo zumbi, mate um jogador inimigo.

description.english: Win by comeback (you against 3) in One Life.
description.german: Wenden Sie das Blatt in "Ein Leben" (gewinnen Sie allein gegen drei Gegner).
description.french: [Extermination] Gagner en effectuant un come-back (1 contre 3).
description.italian: STERMINIO - Sconfiggi il nemico con una rimonta (1 contro 3).
description.spanish: Gana por "comeback" (eres el último jugador) en el modo Una vida.
description.schinese: 在【单命配对】中以1对3的状况获得胜利
description.tchinese: 在【ONELIFE MATCH】中以1對3的狀況獲得勝利
description.russian: Выиграйте ответным ударом (вы против 3) в игре с одной жизнью.
description.japanese: 【ONELIFE MATCH】１対３の状態から勝利する
description.portuguese: Ganhe de virada (você contr 3) em Uma Vida.
description.polish: Wygraj, dokonując powrotu (przeciw 3 graczom) w trybie Jedno Życie.
description.brazilian: Ganhe de virada (você contr 3) em Uma Vida.

description.english: Kill the last player ten times in One Life.
description.german: Töten Sie in "Ein Leben" den letzten Spieler 10-mal.
description.french: [Extermination] Tuer le dernier joueur 10 fois.
description.italian: STERMINIO - Elimina l'ultimo giocatore 10 volte.
description.spanish: Elimina al último jugador 10 veces en el modo Una vida.
description.schinese: 在【单命配对】中击杀最后一名玩家10次
description.tchinese: 在【ONELIFE MATCH】中擊殺最後生存的玩家的次數達10次
description.russian: Убейте последнего игрока десять раз в игре с одной жизнью.
description.japanese: 【ONELIFE MATCH】最後のプレーヤーを１０回キルする
description.portuguese: Mate o último jogador dez vezes em Uma Vida.
description.polish: Zabij ostatniego gracza w trybie Jedno Życie dziesięć razy.
description.brazilian: Mate o último jogador dez vezes em Uma Vida.

description.english: Avoid being killed while chosen as the target in Target Hunter.
description.german: Werden Sie in "Ziel-Jagd" selbst das Ziel und entgehen Sie dem Tod.
description.french: [Cible à abattre] Éviter d'être tué en étant la cible.
description.italian: TARGET - Non morire quando sei il target.
description.koreana: 【TARGET HUNTER】 타깃이 된 상태로 사망하지 않음
description.spanish: Evita ser eliminado al ser el objetivo en el modo Objetivo.
description.schinese: 在【目标猎手】中未曾于自己担任目标时死亡
description.tchinese: 在【TARGET HUNTER】中未曾於自己擔任目標時死亡
description.russian: Не умирайте, пока вы выбраны целью в "Охоте за целью".
description.japanese: 【TARGET HUNTER】自分がターゲットとして死亡しない
description.portuguese: Evite ser morto enquanto for um alvo em Caça ao Alvo.
description.polish: Zabij ostatniego gracza w trybie Łowca Celów dziesięć razy.
description.brazilian: Evite ser morto enquanto for um alvo em Caça ao Alvo.

description.english: Participate in securing the location 4 times in one Domination round.
description.german: Nehmen Sie in einer Runde "Dominieren" 4-mal daran teil, eine Position zu sichern.
description.french: [Domination] Contribuer à la conquête d'une zone 4 fois durant un round.
description.italian: DOMINAZIONE - Contribuisci a conquistare un'area 4 volte in un round.
description.spanish: Participa en asegurar una posición 4 veces en un round del modo Dominación.
description.schinese: 在【据点攻防战】中于单一回合参与占领据点4次
description.tchinese: 在【DOMINATION】中於單一回合參與佔領據點4次
description.russian: Участвуйте в захвате точки 4 раза за один раунд "Доминирования".
description.japanese: 【DOMINATION】１ラウンド中に４回拠点確保に参加する
description.portuguese: Participe da conquista do local 4 vezes em uma rodada de Dominação.
description.polish: 4 razy zabezpiecz lokację w trakcie jednej rundy Dominacji.
description.brazilian: Participe da conquista do local 4 vezes em uma rodada de Dominação.

description.english: Obtain 30 DNA samples by yourself in one DNA Hunter round.
description.german: Sammeln Sie in einer Runde "DNA-Jagd" 30 DNA-Proben selbst ein.
description.french: [Collecte ADN] Récupérer 30 échantillons d'ADN tout seul durant un round.
description.italian: CACCIA AL DNA - Recupera 30 campioni di DNA da solo in un round.
description.koreana: 【DNA HUNTER】 1라운드 중 혼자서 DNA 샘플을 30개 수집
description.spanish: Obtén 30 muestras tú solo en un round de Cazador ADN.
description.schinese: 在【遗传基因猎手】中于单一回合独自搜集30个遗传基因样本
description.tchinese: 在【DNA HUNTER】中於單一回合獨自蒐集30個DNA樣本
description.russian: Получите 30 образцов ДНК за один раунд "Охоты за ДНК".
description.japanese: 【DNA HUNTER】１ラウンド中１人で３０個のDNAサンプルを集める
description.portuguese: Obtenha 30 amostras de DNA sozinho em uma rodada de Caçador de DNA.
description.polish: Zdobądź samodzielnie 30 próbek DNA w jednej rundzie Łowcy DNA.
description.brazilian: Obtenha 30 amostras de DNA sozinho em uma rodada de Caçador de DNA.

description.english: Obtain two special DNA samples by yourself in SP DNA Hunter.
description.german: Sammeln Sie in einer Runde "SP-DNA-Jagd" zwei SP-DNA-Proben selbst ein.
description.french: [Collecte ADN SP] Récupérer 2 échantillons d'ADN spécial tout seul durant un round.
description.italian: CACCIA AL DNA SP - Recupera 2 campioni di DNA speciale da solo in un round.
description.koreana: 【SP DNA HUNTER】 1라운드 중 혼자서 특수 DNA 샘플을 2개 수집
description.spanish: Obtén dos muestras especiales tú solo en Cazador ADN SP
description.schinese: 在【特殊遗传基因猎手】中于单一回合独自搜集2个特殊遗传基因样本
description.tchinese: 在【SP DNA HUNTER】中於單一回合獨自蒐集2個特殊DNA樣本
description.russian: Получите два особых образца ДНК в "Охоте за особым ДНК".
description.japanese: 【SP DNA HUNTER】１ラウンド中に１人で２個の特殊DNAサンプルを集める
description.portuguese: Obtenha duas amostras de DNA especial sozinho em Caçador de DNA ESP.
description.polish: Zdobądź samodzielnie dwie próbki specjalnego DNA w jednej rundzie Łowcy SP DNA.
description.brazilian: Obtenha duas amostras de DNA especial sozinho em Caçador de DNA ESP.

description.english: Kill three enemy players while holding onto the briefcase in Protector.
description.german: Töten Sie in "Beschützen" drei Spieler, während Sie den Koffer halten.
description.french: [Protection] Tuer 3 joueurs ennemis tout en conservant la mallette.
description.italian: SCORTA - Elimina 3 giocatori avversari tenendo la valigetta.
description.koreana: 【PROTECTOR】 기밀 아이템을 보유한 상태로 적 플레이어를 3명 킬
description.spanish: Elimina a 3 enemigos protegiendo el maletín en el modo Protector.
description.schinese: 在【保护者】中于持有机密道具的状态下打倒3名敌方玩家
description.tchinese: 在【PROTECTOR】中於持有機密道具的狀態下打倒3名敵方玩家
description.russian: Убейте трех вражеских игроков, пока вы удерживаете портфель в режиме "Защитник".
description.japanese: 【PROTECTOR】機密アイテムを保持している状態で３人の敵プレーヤーを倒す
description.portuguese: Mate três jogadores inimigos enquanto segura uma pasta em Protetor.
description.polish: Zabij trzech wrogich graczy, trzymając walizkę, w trybie Obrońca.
description.brazilian: Mate três jogadores inimigos enquanto segura uma pasta em Protetor.

description.english: Collect all of the briefcases by yourself in Collector.
description.german: Sammeln Sie in "Sammeln" alle Koffer selbst ein.
description.french: [Récupération] Récupérer toutes les mallettes tout seul.
description.italian: COLLEZIONISTA - Recupera tutte le valigette da solo.
description.spanish: Consigue todos los maletines tú solo en el modo Coleccionista.
description.schinese: 在【收藏者】中独自搜集所有机密道具
description.tchinese: 在【COLLECTOR】中獨自蒐集所有機密道具
description.russian: Самостоятельно соберите все портфели в режиме "Собиратель".
description.japanese: 【COLLECTOR】１人で全ての機密アイテムを集める
description.portuguese: Pegue todas as pastas sozinho em Coletor.
description.polish: Zbierz samodzielnie wszystkie walizki w trybie Zbieracz.
description.brazilian: Pegue todas as pastas sozinho em Coletor.

description.english: Collect five collars during one Collar War round.
description.german: Sammeln Sie in einer Runde "Datenkrieg" fünf Halsbänder ein.
description.french: [Colliers] Récupérer 5 colliers durant un round.
description.italian: RUBA-COLLARI - Recupera 5 collari in un round.
description.spanish: Consigue 5 collares en un round del modo Collares.
description.schinese: 在【项圈争夺战】中于单一回合拾取5个项圈
description.tchinese: 在【COLLAR WAR】中於單一回合拾取5個項圈
description.russian: Соберите пять боевых ошейников в течение одного раунда в режиме "Ошейники".
description.japanese: 【COLLAR WAR】１ラウンド中に首輪を５個拾う
description.portuguese: Pegue cinco colares em uma rodada de Guerra de Colar.
description.polish: Zbierz pięć obroży w jednej rundzie trybu Obroże.
description.brazilian: Pegue cinco colares em uma rodada de Guerra de Colar.

description.english: Kill five enemy players during one Respawn Match round.
description.german: Töten Sie in einer Runde "Respawn" fünf gegnerische Spieler.
description.french: [Respawn] Tuer 5 joueurs ennemis durant un round.
description.italian: RESPAWN - Elimina 5 giocatori nemici in un round.
description.spanish: Elimina a 5 enemigos durante un round del modo Reaparición.
description.schinese: 在【重生比赛】中于单一回合击杀敌方玩家5次
description.tchinese: 在【RESPAWN MATCH】中於單一回合擊殺敵方玩家5次
description.russian: Убейте пять вражеских игроков в течение одного раунда в "Игре с возрождением".
description.japanese: 【RESPAWN MATCH】１ラウンド中に敵プレーヤーを５回キルする
description.portuguese: Mate cinco inimigos em uma rodada de Partida com Ressurreição.
description.polish: Zabij pięciu wrogich graczy w trakcie jednej rundy trybu Odradzanie.
description.brazilian: Mate cinco inimigos em uma rodada de Partida com Ressurreição.

description.english: Complete all U-Trials.
description.german: Schließen Sie alle U-Tests ab.
description.french: Compléter tous les défis Umbrella.
description.italian: Sblocca tutti gli U-Trials.
description.spanish: Completa todos los U-Trials.
description.schinese: 完成所有终极试炼
description.tchinese: 完成所有U-TRIALS
description.russian: Пройдите все А-испытания.
description.japanese: 全てのU-TRIALSを完了する
description.portuguese: Conclua todos os Testes-U.
description.polish: Ukończ wszystkie U-Próby.
description.brazilian: Conclua todos os Testes-U.

displayName.japanese: コンバットマスタリー

description.english: Get a platinum medal for any Combat U-Trial.
description.german: Erhalten Sie eine Platinmedaille in der U-Test-Kategorie "Kampf".
description.french: Obtenir une médaille de platine dans un défi de la catégorie "Combat".
description.italian: Ottieni una medaglia di platino nella categoria "Combattimento" (U-Trials).
description.spanish: Consigue una medalla de platino en cualquier misión de combate.
description.schinese: 获得任意战斗专精项目的白金奖牌
description.tchinese: 獲得任意格鬥專精項目的白金獎牌
description.russian: Получите платиновую медаль в любом А-испытании категории „Битва”.
description.japanese: いずれかのコンバットマスタリー項目でプラチナを取得する
description.portuguese: Consiga uma medalha de platina em qualquer Teste-U de combate.
description.polish: Zdobądź platynowy medal w dowolnej U-Próbie bojowej
description.brazilian: Consiga uma medalha de platina em qualquer Teste-U de combate.

displayName.italian: Uno per tutti e tutti per uno
displayName.japanese: スクワッドマスタリー

description.english: Get a platinum medal for any Squad U-Trial.
description.german: Erhalten Sie eine Platinmedaille in der U-Test-Kategorie "Team".
description.french: Obtenir une médaille de platine dans un défi de la catégorie "Escouade".
description.italian: Ottieni una medaglia di platino nella categoria "Squadra" (U-Trials).
description.spanish: Consigue una medalla de platino en cualquier misión de equipo.
description.schinese: 获得任意小队专精项目的白金奖牌
description.tchinese: 獲得任意小隊專精項目的白金獎牌
description.russian: Получите платиновую медаль в любом А-испытании категории „Отряд”.
description.japanese: いずれかのスクワッドマスタリー項目でプラチナを取得する
description.portuguese: Consiga uma medalha de platina em qualquer Teste-U de equipe.
description.polish: Zdobądź platynowy medal w dowolnej U-Próbie oddziału.
description.brazilian: Consiga uma medalha de platina em qualquer Teste-U de equipe.

description.english: Get a platinum medal for any Weapon U-Trial.
description.german: Erhalten Sie eine Platinmedaille in der U-Test-Kategorie "Waffen".
description.french: Obtenir une médaille de platine dans un défi de la catégorie "Armes".
description.italian: Ottieni una medaglia di platino nella categoria "Armi" (U-Trials).
description.spanish: Consigue una medalla de platino en cualquier misión de armas.
description.schinese: 获得任意武器专精项目的白金奖牌
description.tchinese: 獲得任意武器專精項目的白金獎牌
description.russian: Получите платиновую медаль в любом А-испытании категории „Оружие”.
description.japanese: いずれかのウェポンマスタリー項目でプラチナを取得する
description.portuguese: Consiga uma medalha de platina em qualquer Teste-U de arma.
description.polish: Zdobądź platynowy medal w dowolnej U-Próbie z bronią.
description.brazilian: Consiga uma medalha de platina em qualquer Teste-U de arma.

displayName.japanese: グレネードマスタリー

description.english: Get a platinum medal for any Grenade U-Trial.
description.german: Erhalten Sie eine Platinmedaille in der U-Test-Kategorie "Granaten".
description.french: Obtenir une médaille de platine dans un défi de la catégorie "Grenades".
description.italian: Ottieni una medaglia di platino nella categoria "Granate" (U-Trials).
description.spanish: Consigue una medalla de platino en cualquier misión de granadas.

description.english: Play in all of the maps.

description.schinese: 游玩过所有地图
description.tchinese: 遊玩過所有地圖

description.polish: Zagraj na wszystkich mapach.

description.tchinese: 遊玩過所有模式

description.polish: Zagraj we wszystkich trybach gry.

description.english: Raise your player rank to 60.
description.german: Erhöhen Sie Ihren Spielerrang auf 60.
description.french: Atteindre le niveau 60.
description.italian: Raggiungi il livello giocatore 60.
description.spanish: Llega a nivel de jugador 60.
description.schinese: 将玩家等级提升至60
description.tchinese: 將玩家階級提昇至60

description.portuguese: Aumente sua classificação de jogador até 60.
description.polish: Podnieś pozycję gracza do 60.
description.brazilian: Aumente sua classificação de jogador até 60.

description.english: Complete the tutorial.
description.german: Schließen Sie das Tutorial ab.

description.tchinese: 完成教學導覽

description.portuguese: Complete o tutorial.
description.polish: Ukończ samouczek.
description.brazilian: Complete o tutorial.

description.french: [L'expérience] Compléter tous les niveaux.

description.tchinese: 通過The Experiment的所有關卡

description.polish: Przejdź wszystkie etapy Eksperymentu.
